meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6507.

td.p: Tom McGrath, an actor and photographer from Chicago, Illinois
Beth Copenhaver, a software consultant from Johns Creek, Georgia
Kris Hamilton, a computer technician from Dublin, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,200)

tr.td: UNLIKELY PRESIDENTIAL SIBLINGS
(Alex: Let me give you an example. For instance, George W. Bush and Reggie Bush--that's an unlikely pairing, isn't it?)
THAT'S "CORN"Y
RELIGION & FLAGS
LET'S DUET
I'D LIKE A DRINK
IT'S THE COCKATIEL HOUR

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_4', 'clue_DJ_6_4_stuck', '(Tom: If it\'s wrong, I\'m in trouble. What is Mc?)
(Alex: No. You\'re in trouble.)
(Tom: Oh, boy.)
(Alex: Correct response--what is [*]? The French for "son" is fils--F-I-L-S.)
(Tom: Sorry, Coach.)
(Alex: It\'s all right.)

Fitz

Tom
')
